description: Tankard, ceramic with pewter mounts, painted in high temperature colors with a design of sprayed manganese medallions alternately plain and floral and bordered in blue and black, medallions separated by narrow floral panels on white ground, conventionalized floral forms in orange and chartreuse, German XVIIIc TWO INVENTORY CARDS LISTED AS '37.9.16'- UNSURE WHICH IS CORRECT-NO DIMS. ON CAT.CARDS
title: Tankard
